text: Yesli on razvelsya s ney v tretiy raz, to yemu ne dozvoleno zhenit'sya na ney, poka ona ne vyydet zamuzh za drugogo. I yesli tot razvedetsya s ney, to oni ne sovershat grekha, yesli vossoyedinyatsya, polagaya, chto oni smogut soblyusti ogranicheniya Allakha. Takovy ogranicheniya Allakha. On raz"yasnyayet ikh dlya lyudey znayushchikh
